review: This is the fourth Apple TV I've purchased. Having used the new Roku and Chromecast extensively, I simply cannot see how someone passes on purchasing an Apple TV. The ease of use of this device is second to none. It requires nothing but itself and internet. As a standalone media unit, it has quite a robust offering. Go to Apple's website to see all the content available, but needless to say, it is fully-loaded, and getting content updates regularly. Pair this with a Mac, iPhone or iPad and you have endless possibilities. I use an Apple TV in my office as a wireless monitor. Over AirPlay I can stream content not yet available on the device (such as Amazon Instant). For its average price these days (around $85) there is nothing that works as well. You won't regret buying one.
author: Trevor
